name: Last Winter
description:
-- Introduction to the plot --

Your city is threatened by soldiers from an unknown city.  As a member of the special forces, you are sent on a message mission to forge an alliance and guarantee peace in your city. However, you failed to complete the tasks entrusted to you, and your city is now destroyed. Now you must survive in a world ravaged by war.

-- Information --

Last Winter is a non-linear Furry PostApo VN with love threads

This game is created by one person. Everything (Except what is specified in the Credits tab) is created by the author of the game. 

The game is an early project and a lot of things can change. Right now, the game has a lot of bugs that I'm trying to fix. If you found an bug, mistakes in the translation or have a question write a comment, I will try to read it and write back.

This game is the first one I've created, so I don't think it's going to be good despite my efforts. I'm still learning how to make games in Ren'Py . And one more thing, my native language is not English so if there are any mistakes in the translation, I apologize in advance.

I don't have any character images yet. I have to draw them or ask someone for help.
